div.p: Welcome to the Montoursville Area School District website. In an effort to update our technology, we’ve updated our website to a newer, improved version. All of the necessary content has been migrated from the old site, and we’ve introduced some new features highlighting the many accomplishments in our district. The menus have been revised and consolidated for a more logical flow and a modern look and feel. Please enjoy your time browsing our site. You will find that we embrace pride, excellence, and tradition in our mission to educate students.

If you would like your child to participate in this program, please contact your child’s school nurse.

p.span: As notification systems become overwhelmed by high use nationwide, there is a potential to see delays in our alerts. Please continue to check back here for updates and information relating to this outbreak and school closure.
Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Beginning Monday, March 30th, our teachers will be posting suggested review and enrichment materials to provide opportunities for our children to maintain their skill levels for when they return. These materials can be found under our "Schools" tab here on our website.

span.a: How the District Will Be Moving Forward
